Author: prakash
Content: I would say Viaweb and/or Vermeer purely because there is so much information about them.

Author: jgamman
Content: i believe the etiquette is a discreet click of the up arrow, perhaps a wry smirk at your screen, then move along, nothing to see here...

Author: davidw
Content: When I realized that it's difficult to find places to work where you're not working for a fking moron. I want to make cool things and work with people who don't suck. I don't really care if that means a startup, but things certainly seem to point in that direction.

Author: michaelneale
Content:
I am a little frustrated by the ability to not vote things down (hence the need to make a negative comment).

Also, I have no idea why I commented on this story. I must have had mouse parallax error and clicked on the wrong one. I was outside in the sun (at a cafe) and there was a bit of glare, but it definitely was NOT this story that I intended to comment on.
